content.question: Write a thesis statement that you might use for an essay that analyzes how the interaction between these characters contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Beneath your thesis statement, write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

frqParts.text: Write a thesis statement that you might use for an essay that analyzes how the interaction between these characters contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Beneath your thesis statement, write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
